channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 things to know about the new obesity pills that are on the way
item.description: Instead of struggling with weekly injections, patients may soon be able to swallow a daily pill to lose weight. Both the makers of Wegovy and Mounjaro...

item.title: New limits on school loans could narrow physician and nurse pipeline, educators warn
item.description: Under new Trump administration rules, students won't be able to borrow as much for medical or nursing school or some other health professions.

item.title: Just one week off social media can improve young adults' mental health, study finds
item.description: A new study shows that cutting social media use for just one week can reduce mental health symptoms, like anxiety and depression, in young adults.

item.title: Eosinophilic Esophagitis Demands Whole-Patient Care
item.description: EoE is increasingly diagnosed in Europe, yet for many patients, the biggest hurdle lies beyond treating the inflammation. Medscape News Europe

item.title: When Alcohol and COPD Collide, Lungs Suffer More
item.description: Experts urge primary care docs to question the alcohol use of patients with COPD. Medscape Medical News

item.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
item.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.
